locations: Ed Sullivan Theater - 1697 Broadway, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert
plot: Stephen Colbert took over as host, executive producer and writer of THE LATE SHOW on Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015. The comedy-variety-talk show is broadcast five nights a week from the Ed Sullivan theater in New York.
synopsis: Stephen Colbert takes over as host, executive producer and writer of THE LATE SHOW, the legendary variety-comedy-talk show filmed weeknights before a live audience at the Ed Sullivan Theater in New York.The host, writer, producer, satirist and comedian is well-known for his previous late night show, The Colbert Report, for which he earned two Peabody Awards and 41 Emmy Award nominations, with two Emmy Award wins for Outstanding Variety Series in 2013 and 2014.
